title: Reach Wizard
description: Our SAAS finds people that have shown interest in your service/product. Once it does that, it writes you a sales script that you can use to message some (personalized for each person). Meanwhile, you teach the AI about your business so whenever someone responds back to you, the AI will reply back on it's own and will take care of the whole conversation. Leaving you, the business owner, to just sit back and watch the whole sales process be automated by our software.
